title: Drunk Indian Man Dies After Workers Build Road Over Him
content:
A drunk man in India died after construction workers built a road over him, Reuters reported. 

Police said the man was returning home for the evening when he fell into the hold. 

Construction workers filled the hole with tar and flattened the surface with a heavy roller. Locals spotted his shirt and he was pulled out of the road dead on Monday. 

The man was heading to a liquor shop after attending a village fair, police said.
